name: Between Two Claws
description:
Overview

Hook those crab pots to haul in your catch.  Be sure to sort them properly because only male crabs of a proper size are legal.  Get in as many legal crabs before the time runs out. 

Controls

A controller is required to play this game. 

Credits

Aaron (satellitecore): Lead design, Project Manager, Bug Noticer

Brian(BRNielsen): Lead programmer, Bug Creator
